Units: Population in households in MPO boundary
Population in group quarters in MPO boundary
Average annual per capita income of MPO households in 2005 dollars

Calculation: apply( Dvmt.DiIgDtPp[,,,"Household"], 1, sum ) / apply( Pop.DiIgDtPpHt[,,,"Household",], 1, sum )
Units: Average Percapita DVMT of MPO households

Calculation: 365 * apply( HhCo2e.DiIgDtPp[,,,"Household"], 1, sum ) / apply( Pop.DiIgDtPpHt[,,,"Household",], 1, sum )
Units: Annual percapita metric tons of CO2e emitted by household light-duty vehicles

Calculation: 365 * apply( HhOpCost.DiIgDtPp[,,,"Household"], 1, sum  ) / apply( Hh.DiIgDtPpHt[,,,"Household",], 1, sum )
Units: Average annual MPO household vehicle operating cost

Calculation: 365 * apply( HhVehOwnCost.DiIgDtPp[,,,"Household"], 1, sum  ) / apply( Hh.DiIgDtPpHt[,,,"Household",], 1, sum )
Units: Average annual MPO household vehicle ownership cost

Calculation: 365 * apply( HhExtCost.DiIgDtPp[,,,"Household"], 1, sum ) / apply( Hh.DiIgDtPpHt[,,,"Household",], 1, sum )
Units: Average annual MPO household social cost due to vehicle use

Calculation: apply( Pop.DiDtPpMx[,,,"1"], 1, sum ) / apply( Pop.DiIgDtPpHt, 1, sum )
Units: Proportion of MPO population living in mixed-use neighborhoods
